page.title: 05SPRING BANK.
page.content: The area we studied ran along the south side of{Spring Bank West}from Botanic Crossing to Pulman Street. It is mainly residential _ mainly privately owned houses and flats. However, there are 8 small{hotels and {guest houses}contained in the area. Situated at the bottom of Hymer's Avenue is a public school called {Hymer's College.}It stands in its own grounds and has a huge pond that, on occasions,has been known to disappear. Spring Bank West is adequately served by many bus routes. The East Yorkshire Motor Company operates Services 1, 2, 3, 4 and 13. Kingston Upon Hull Corporation operates services 14, 15, 15C, 20 and 20E. The area covered has very few shops. There is a D.I.Y. shop, a bicycle repair shop and a car sales site.
